Title: The Frogmen
Notes: Scuba diving experts including Richard Widmark operate as military commandos

Title: Beneath the 12-Mile Reef
Notes: Story of sponge divers off the Florida Keys , starring Robert Wagner

Title: The Silent World
Notes: Directed by Jacques-Yves Cousteau and Louis Malle

Title: World Without Sun
Notes: Directed by Jacques-Yves Cousteau , chronicles Conshelf Two , the first attempt to create an underwater habitat for humans to live on the sea floor

Title: Voyage to the Edge of the World
Notes: Directed by Jacques-Yves Cousteau , Philippe Cousteau and Marshall Flaum , chronicles a four months expedition by Cousteau to Antarctica

Title: The Deep
Notes: Dangerous men go after scuba divers Nick Nolte and Jacqueline Bisset near Bermuda

Title: The Big Blue
Notes: French director Luc Besson 's story of free divers , starring Jean Reno and Rosanna Arquette

Title: Ghosts of the Abyss
Notes: Director James Cameron and crew submerge to explore remains of Titanic

Title: Open Water
Notes: Director Chris Kentis . The story of the disappearance of scuba divers Tom and Eileen Lonergan in 1998

Title: The Cave
Notes: Off coast of Romania , spelunkers and divers discover terrifying parasites

Title: Into the Blue
Notes: Divers Jessica Alba and Paul Walker find crashed plane transporting cocaine

Title: Fool 's Gold
Notes: Treasure hunter Matthew McConaughey dives searching for Spanish galleon

Title: Sanctum
Notes: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world

Title: No Limits
Notes: Made for TV as part of ESPN 's Nine for IX series . Explores the life of Audrey Mestre , a world-class freediver , and the events leading up to the dive that ultimately took her life
